Adventure Guildsman:
Welcome! Is there anything you want to ask?
Information is as valuable to an adventurer as power or courage! You won't get far if you don't know where the monsters and treasure are.
Listen carefully!
And don't forget to come find me to exchange your Adventurer's Marks and Seals that you'll get thanks to that information!
